casebody.data:
No. 09-8044. Loyd Landon Sorrow, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 559 U.S. 948, 130 S. Ct. 1529,

176 L. Ed. 2d 129,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 1424, February 22, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
